quest.name: Oh Matron
journal: This clumsy Mol maiden has broken something fairly important.
objectives: Slay three matamata and obtain a matamata matron shell and claw from a matamata matron.
Deliver the matamata matron shell and claw to the Mol maiden.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Please, you have to help me. I have broken the gifts I was supposed to give my soon-to-be husband's family. I need to fix them as soon as possible.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: I require a matamata's shell and claw. However, I am incapable of obtaining them myself.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: What is more, they must be taken from a matamata matron. A creature which is seldom seen.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Though, there is a way to draw one out into the open. Slay several matamata and one will appear eventually.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: I was told to marry my husband by the elder gods themselves. This marriage must go ahead.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Slay the matamata to the west and a matron will appear soon enough.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Please bring its shell and a claw back to me. Without those I cannot repair the gifts.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! I do not know what I would have done without you.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Our tribe is smaller than most. We try to prevent ourselves from becoming alienated from the other tribes by marrying our members with theirs.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: It will take a while for me to get used to a life that is not controlled by the elder gods, but I know everything will be fineâ”€it was they who chose this path for me.

dialogue.name: BRIDE02764
dialogue.text: Now, it is time I began repairing the gifts. Should our paths cross again someday, I would very much like to introduce you to my new family.
